column5: What is a good target for fathead spawning on Lac Seul(Ear Falls area). Late June? Early July? Mid July? Thanks
What is a good target for fathead spawning on Lac Seul(Ear Falls area). Late June? Early July? Mid July? Thanks

Cecil, Dont know the answer to your question. Why do you want to know? Do you think that it will have a large affect on the Lac Seul fishing? We have fished Lac Seul for ten years in June, July and August and the fishing is always great as long as we follow the fish out on their transistion to deeper water once they leave the spawning areas.

Because of success on water we can't get to this summer(fly in), but we do plan to pull the boat to Lac Suel...when fat heads spawn in late spring, early summer walleyes stack in the shallow weedy bays. It is dynamite if timed right. On the flyin, the first two weeks of July are the target times.

CecilB This is a hard question to answer because they start to spawn when the water temp gets to about 16c or 60F, so it depends on the weather. They start in May and it goes though August and fatheads can spawn up to 12 times a year.
Sheese, that is the first I heard of this. What makes it special? Do the fatheads group up better when spawning or something?
